channel.title: Computers on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with
channel.description: Recent content in Computers on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with

item.title: Introducing gwt
item.description: After working on it for a bit, and convincing a coworker to use it and provide feedback, I’ve finally made gwt an actual thing.

item.title: Generating DNS noise
item.description: DNS is one of those thing most people never think about.

item.title: Ricing it up
item.description: One of the reasons that I find myself going back to Gentoo is that you compile the entire system for your hardware which, in theory, leads to the best performance possible.

item.title: Hello again old friend
item.description: I posted a year ago about dropping ClearLinux and switching to Ubuntu Server on my NUC.

item.title: It's Podman, man
item.description: As mentioned (very) briefly in other posts, I run Home Assistant as the ‘control hub’ for all my “smart” devices in my home.

item.title: Bye Pi, Hello NUC
item.description: About a year ago (Sep 2019 to be precise) I decided to end my Raspberry Pi experiment and begin a new experiment with an Intel NUC.

item.title: Glutton for Punishment
item.description: I recently got a new Macbook Pro from work as my old one was having keyboard issues and since it was 3+ yrs old they deemed it not worth fixing.
